newsitem.title: CHINA: China January zinc output up 69.9 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: China January zinc output up 69.9 pct yr/yr.

text.p: China produced 130,800 tonnes of zinc in January, up 69.9 percent compared with January 1996, the State Statistical Bureau said on Thursday.
China produced 1.0687 million tonnes of zinc in 1996, down 0.32 percent compared to 1995, the bureau has said.
The agency gave no further details.
